short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome Extension that displays upcoming Codeforces contests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension is used to provide instant response of the upcoming contests for the user. The user's need not go into the Codeforces and Leetcode websites inorder to know about the upcoming contests.
